text:
SharkByte Associates | Ottawa, Canada | React Native Developer | 2-month contract | REMOTE

We are looking for a talented React Native developer for a 2-month, full-time contract, with possibility of extension after that. This is a remote position, so you are free to work from anywhere you want.

You will be working with a talented UX designer to create a mobile app for iOS and Android.

For more details and to apply, please email jobs@alphalist.ca
